TextBlock.Text: ILEX: What a stellar landing, Solanum! Even if I'd known the key to powering the tower, I would still have found difficulty calculating such a precise landing through Giant's Deep thick atmosphere.
SOLANUM: Bells was the one who guided me on how to enter the tower, Ilex. You wouldn't have been stuck outside the tower if you remembered to visit her before departing!
SOLANUM: You should enter and take the trial first, Ilex! Conoy told me of a secret within the tower I would like to investigate during my attempt of the trial.
ILEX: Oh? A secret within the tower? Do you imagine I might be able to find it during my trial without assistance?

SOLANUM: I'm afraid that is highly unlikely! Conoy said we would need to <color=orange>collaborate</color> in this endeavour: The tower must be <color=orange>powered down again</color> to find this secret!
ILEX: <color=orange>Power down</color> the tower..? Oh! Would one of us recall the shuttle away from the landing pad, while the other waits atop the tower?
SOLANUM: Precisely on the planet's poles, Ilex! That is why I would like you to complete the trial first; I would not like to have to calculate another precise shuttle trajectory back here!
ILEX: But that means.. Would only one of us get to see the secret then..?
SOLANUM: Well.. I could take a photo of it for you to see! While I investigate, you could visit our old friends from Sunless City over at their dwellings on Statue Island!
ILEX: A photo? Solanum, how would you feel if I told you about an exciting secret, asked you to return home as I explored it - then only showed you a photo of it taken in the dark?!
